attributes.action: U.K and/or U.N to intervene with Chechnya Concentration Camps
attributes.additional_details:
Listed are links to articles that give insight on the crimes that are currently being committed by twisted individuals and the insane persecution of innocent individuals!

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/www.dailystar.co.uk/news/latest-news/604515/chechnya-gay-concentration-camps-russia/amp

http://www.pinknews.co.uk/2017/04/10/chechnya-has-opened-concentration-camps-for-gay-men/

https://www.theguardian.com/world/2017/apr/02/chechen-police-rounded-up-100-gay-men-report-russian-newspaper-chechnya
attributes.background:
We the people call upon the current government of the United Kingdom, along with the U.N  to either intervene or investigate the extreme neo-nazi activity happening in Chechnya.

Innocent humans are being tortured in concentration camps which breaks the laws of the Human Rights Act!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. This petition is asking the United Nations to take action. 

You might like to sign this petition instead: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/194915
